pullRequest.title: Configure Subnetwork Trace: Amend UI sizing
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Following the feedback from verification on the different platforms and a discussion at review meeting, I've amended the UI slightly:

Separated the label for defining new conditions onto a separate line to leave more space for the UI components for selecting the conditions.
Adjusted the widths of these combo boxes so that the text within them is always visible.
Aligned the whole UI top left

Have tested on Windows and SV and seems to work well - I could previously replicate the same feedback so should hopefully be ok on the other platforms too but will need to be checked again on Mac and Linux too.

Checklist:

 Set target branch to master (current release) or dev (next release)
 Request a reviewer
 Assign a reviewer
 Tag reviewer in comment

nodes.bodyText:
Instead of separating this, you might be able to add a CSS rule that puts some padding on the bottom of the label?
The easier alternative would be, since it's only one element, to get rid of the outer HBox here and the behaviour would be the same:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    <HBox>
          
          
            
                        <Label text="Define new conditions:"/>
          
          
            
                    </HBox>
          
          
            
                    <Label text="Define new conditions:"/>
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -28,17 +28,20 @@
 <StackPane stylesheets="/configure_subnetwork_trace/style.css" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/10.0.2-internal" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1"
            fx:controller="com.esri.samples.configure_subnetwork_trace.ConfigureSubnetworkTraceController">
 
-    <VBox>
+    <VBox StackPane.alignment="TOP_LEFT">
         <HBox>
             <Label text="Trace options:"/>
             <CheckBox fx:id="includeBarriersCheckBox" text="Include Barriers"/>
             <CheckBox fx:id="includeContainersCheckBox" text="Include Containers"/>
         </HBox>
 
-        <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT">
-            <Label text="Define new conditions"/>
-            <ComboBox fx:id="comparisonSourcesComboBox" onAction="#onComparisonSourceChanged"/>
-            <ComboBox fx:id="comparisonOperatorsComboBox"/>
+        <HBox>
+            <Label text="Define new conditions:"/>
+        </HBox>

nodes.bodyText: I am seeing this old number and thinking, could we make this 180? 😄

commit.message: amendments to css and fxml styles

nodes.bodyText: just missing a newline at the end of this file.
